titleStmt.title: The following speech being spoke off hand upon the debates in the House of Commons ...
Speech in the House of Commons against the naturalization of foreigners
titleStmt.author: Knight, John, Sir, d. 1718.

titleStmt.title: The following speech being spoke off hand upon the debates in the House of Commons ...
Speech in the House of Commons against the naturalization of foreigners
titleStmt.author: Knight, John, Sir, d. 1718.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir John Knight by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
In opposition to a bill to naturalize Protestant immigrants, rejected by the House of Commons 15 March 1694.
Also published under title: A speech in the House of Commons against the naturalization of foreigners, 1693 [1694?]
Item at reel 1869:12 incorrectly identified as Wing K687A.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York and Bodleian Library.
